Plot: A video game developer's world spirals out of control when his shape-shifting indestructible virtual creation becomes all too real.
Title: Ra.One
Writer: David Benullo, Kanika Dhillon (dialogue), Kanika Dhillon (screenplay), Niranjan Iyengar (dialogue), Shah Rukh Khan (screenplay), Mushtaq Sheikh (screenplay), Anubhav Sinha (story), Anubhav Sinha
Actors: Shah Rukh Khan, Arjun Rampal, Kareena Kapoor, Shahana Goswami
